0: O Mother of God, we sing your praises,* for you were a virgin before conceiving* and remained a virgin after giving birth.* And since you have given birth to our Salvation, Jesus Christ,* you have become a treasury of assistance* for all who seek resurrection and eternal life.* Therefore, lift us up from the depth of our transgressions,* for we place our hope in you.
1: O Mother of God, most pure Virgin,* with the heavenly Powers pray to your Son,* that, before our death, He grant forgiveness of sins* to us, who faithfully extol you.
2: O Mother of God, we honour you,* for you were seen to be higher than the angels* when you carried God in your womb.
3: O virgin Mother of God,* unceasingly intercede with Christ our God* who was crucified for us and destroyed the power of Death,* that He may save our souls.
4: O pure One, the fruit of your womb* is the perfect fulfilment of the prophets and of the Law.* Therefore, O Mother of God,* we glorify you with thanks and we exalt you with great devotion.
5: O virgin Mother of God,* unceasingly intercede with Christ our God* who was crucified for us and destroyed the power of Death,* that He may save our souls.
